channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 13:13 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 13:13 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#m_nikopol_that_nikopol. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 13:13 Attention! Please note that the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
